txt.en: Complete a study of the key moments in Hermáth Stormhammer's account of the Battle of Azanulbizar.
You have learned of the meeting of the Kings of the Seven Houses at Amdân on the eve of the Battle of Azanulbizar.
You have learned of the failure of King Thráin's vanguard at the East-gate of Moria, how Thorin came to wield the Oakenshield, and of the heroic sacrifice of the Zhélruka, Shálun.
You have learned of the charge of the Iron-folk, the tragic death of Náin Orcsfoe, and the slaying of Azog by Dáin.

You have learned of the staking of Azog's head at the East-gate, the last council of the Seven Houses at Durin's Stone, the sighting of Durin's Bane, and of the pyres that marked the sorrowful end of the Sixth War of the Dwarves of Orcs.
Complete a study of the key moments in Hermáth Stormhammer's account of the Battle of Azanulbizar.
